Functions from gamlss/gamlss.add with bugs fixed

Source: R/gamlss_fix.R
ga.Rd

An additive function to be used while fitting GAMLSS models. The interface for gam() in the mgcv package.

Usage

ga(formula, envir, control = ga.control(...), ...)

Arguments

formula

A formula of the model.

envir

The environment.

control

The control of the model fitting.

...

Other arguments.

Value

A xvar list.

ga

NA

Examples

print("No example")
#> [1] "No example"

On this page
